Ibra ljudina! Hoće u Bolonju zbog Mihe
Šveđanin se izgleda definitivno vraća u Seriju A

02 Nov 2019

Znamo da je Zlatan Ibrahimović tražena roba ove zime nakon odluke da napusti Los Anđeles Galaksi gde mu je istekao ugovor, a najviše se šuškalo o povratku u Italiju gde je ranije već nosio dresove sva tri velikana - Juventusa, Milana i Intera. Ipak, njegov novi klub neće biti neko od spomenutih timova već Bolonja u čije redove Šveđanin želi da se preseli samo zbog jednog čoveka - našeg Siniše Mihajlovića.
To je večeras medijima potvrdio i direktor Bolonjeza Valter Sabatini, koji je obećao da će učinitiu sve da se "ova ludost" ostvari. Štaviše, Sabatini je potvrdio da će Zlatanu njegov klub ponuditi 8.000.000 evra za 18-mesečni ugovor."Ibrahimović želi da pređe kod nas zbog odnosa sa Sinišom. Nije nemoguće. Može da se izvede, ali ako se to desi to će biti samo zbog njhovog odnosa. Ibra želi da pomogne prijatelju Mihajloviću i sve što mogu da kažem je da ću učiniti sve što mogu da se ova ludost i ostvari", obećao je Sabatini.
Podsetimo, trener Bolonje Siniša Mihajlović trenutno je u bolnici na trećem tretmani hemoterpije u borbi sa leukemijom koja mu je dijagnostifikovana u julu.
Foto: Reuters
text:
Ibra man! He wants to go to Bologna because of Micah
The Swede seems to be definitely returning to Serie A

02 Nov 2019

We know that Zlatan Ibrahimovic was the wanted goods this winter after deciding to leave the Los Angeles Galaxy, where his contract expired, and most of all, it was rumored to return to Italy where he had previously worn the jerseys of all three greats - Juventus, Milan and Inter. However, his new club will not be one of the teams mentioned, but Bologna, in whose ranks the Swede wants to move only because of one man - our Sinisa Mihajlovic.
Bolognese director Walter Sabatini confirmed this to the media tonight, who promised to do everything to make "this folly" come true. Moreover, Sabatini has confirmed that Zlatan will be offered his club 8,000,000 euros for an 18-month contract. "Ibrahimovic wants to come to us because of his relationship with Sinisa. It's not impossible. It can be done, but if that happens, it will only be Ibra wants to help his friend Mihajlovic and all I can say is that I will do everything I can to make this madness happen, "Sabatini promised.
Recall, Bologna coach Sinisa Mihajlovic is currently in the hospital undergoing third chemotherapy treatments to fight leukemia, which he was diagnosed with in July.
